function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Mention of drug use may pose a risk of substance abuse and addiction, which can contribute to public health issues and disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of public health issues, including disease transmission and societal harm.","Mitigation":"Implement public health education programs, access to addiction treatment, and regulatory measures to control drug distribution.","Technologies":"Biometric identification, drug monitoring systems, and advanced wastewater analysis for drug detection.","People":"General public, healthcare providers, law enforcement, addiction specialists","Owner":"Health authorities, law enforcement agencies, addiction treatment centers"},{"Description":"Mention of national coalitions or efforts for Covid-19 may indicate areas with active transmission and potential for disease spread.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks in the mentioned countries and regions.","Mitigation":"Enhance public health measures, vaccination campaigns, and travel restrictions to limit disease spread.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, real-time data analytics, and genomic sequencing for variant tracking.","People":"Residents, travelers, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies, international health organizations"}]}
